Solar-powered devices: Use portable solar panels to charge your devices during the day, on on the power source.
Human-powered devices: Use hand-crank or foot-powered generators to generate electricity for your devices.
Wind-powered devices: Use portable wind turbines to generate electricity for your devices.
Kinetic-powered devices: Use kinetic energy generated by movement to power your devices, such as using a hand-crank generator while jogging.
Radio-powered devices: Use radio waves to power your devices, such as using a radio-controlled car as a power source.
